edu.uci.calismall

Class GenericTouchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ScaleGestureDetector.SimpleOnScaleGestureListener
      • edu.uci.calismall.GenericTouchHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScaleGestureDetector.OnScaleGestureListener, TouchHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BubbleMenu, CaliView.ScaleListener, GhostStrokeHandler

    public abstract class GenericTouchHandler
extends ScaleGestureDetector.SimpleOnScaleGestureListener
implements TouchHandler
    Groups functionalities that are common to many touch handlers.
    Author:
    Michele Bonazza

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean actionCompleted
      The value returned by done(): subclasses should change the value of this field to true whenever their management for a sequence of touch events is completed.
      protected CaliView parentView
      The view for which this handler was created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GenericTouchHandler(String name, CaliView parent)
      Creates a new handler with the argument name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean done()
      Returns whether this handler has completed handling an action.
      boolean onCancel()
      Called when an MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN is detected, that is whenever users press some button that cancels the current action.
      boolean onDown(PointF touchPoint)
      Called when an MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN is detected, that is whenever the first touch event is detected for an action.
      boolean onMove(PointF touchPoint)
      Called when an MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE is detected, that is whenever any of the previously detected touch pointers is dragged along the screen.
      boolean onPointerDown(PointF touchPoint, MotionEvent event)
      Called when an MotionEvent.ACTION_POINTER_DOWN is detected, that is whenever the second and any following touch event is detected for an action.
      boolean onPointerUp(PointF touchPoint, MotionEvent event)
      Called when an MotionEvent.ACTION_POINTER_UP is detected, that is whenever one of the touch pointer is destroyed because of the user no longer touching the screen.
      boolean onUp(PointF touchPoint)
      Called when an MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN is detected, that is whenever the last pointer is destroyed because the user lifted all her fingers/styluses from the screen.
      boolean processTouchEvent(int action, PointF touched, MotionEvent event)
      Processes the event labeled with the argument action which took place at the argument point.
      String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class android.view.ScaleGestureDetector.SimpleOnScaleGestureListener

        onScale, onScaleBegin, onScaleEnd

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • parentView

        protected final CaliView parentView
        The view for which this handler was created.

      • actionCompleted

        protected boolean actionCompleted
        The value returned by done(): subclasses should change the value of this field to true whenever their management for a sequence of touch events is completed.

        Every time this handler is passed a new MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN, the value of this field is reset to false.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenericTouchHandler

        public GenericTouchHandler(String name,
                   CaliView parent)
        Creates a new handler with the argument name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name that identifies this handler
        parent - the parent view

    • Method Detail

      • processTouchEvent

        public boolean processTouchEvent(int action,
                        PointF touched,
                        MotionEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: TouchHandler
        Processes the event labeled with the argument action which took place at the argument point.
        Specified by:
        processTouchEvent in interface TouchHandler
        Parameters:
        action - the result of calling MotionEvent.getAction() on the MotionEvent that generated this call
        touched - the point in canvas coordinates at which the action took place
        event - the event to be processed
        Returns:
        true if this event was handled by this handler

      • done

        public boolean done()
        Description copied from interface: TouchHandler
        Returns whether this handler has completed handling an action.
        Specified by:
        done in interface TouchHandler
        Returns:
        true if this handler has completed its job, false if touch events must still be redirected to this handler

      • onDown

        public boolean onDown(PointF touchPoint)
        Description copied from interface: TouchHandler
        Called when an MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN is detected, that is whenever the first touch event is detected for an action.
        Specified by:
        onDown in interface TouchHandler
        Parameters:
        touchPoint - the point in canvas coordinates touched by the user
        Returns:
        true if the event should be "swallowed" by this method, false if it should be forwarded to other TouchHandler'
